person.person-note: elected 24 May 2015, inaugurated 6 August; re-elected 12 July 2020; inaugurated 6 August

dir-section.heading: Council of Ministers
dir-section.p: The Government comprises representatives of the Platforma Obywatelska (PO—Civic Platform), the Polskie Stronnictwo Ludowe (PSL—Polish People’s Party), the Nowa Lewica (NL—New Left), Polska 2050 (Poland 2050), the Inicjatywa Polska (Polish Initiative) and Nowoczesna (Modern), as well as independents.
